info About

NMS αβ (pronounced "alphabet") is an unofficial translation service of alien words for No Man's Sky.

It is available for Web and Android.

code Open Source

NMS αβ is a open source project under MIT License.

It's source code is available on GitHub, get it for Web and Android.
